theme.title: Enable Bloomreach Autosuggest on a theme
theme.description: Bloomreach needs to integrate into your theme to handle search on your store. Read more in our

primaryAction.label: Enable Bloomreach Configurations Embed Block
primaryAction.description: Click on the button below to enable Bloomreach Configurations Embed Block in your theme. This will add supporting modules for all Bloomreach components and allow you to enable the autosuggest experience.

template.title: Template
template.description: Configure the template for displaying your autosuggests powered by Bloomreach API's
